article_summary:
Chances are, if you liked the idea of lower rates, you can keep dreaming of lower rates.
Fox News anchor Martha MacCallum does.
— martha maccallum (@marthamaccallum) February 25, 2014Who saves $2,500?
— Marc Hoover (@MarcHoover1) February 25, 2014Related:Full Twitchy coverage of Martha MacCallum
A new report from the Centers for Medicare and Medicaid Services estimates that 11 million small business employees will see their health insurance premiums increase.
